pages.text: > $(n)Behavior:$() Passive$(br)> $(n)Spawn:$() $(9)Oceans$() in the $(6)Overworld().$(br)> $(n)Drops:$() Chance between 1-7 $(item)Gold Nugget$() or 1-4 $(item)Diamond$(), Chance between 0-1 $(item)Amethyst$() or 1-5 $(item)Salt$(), Chance between 1-9 $(item)Iron Nugget$() or 0-2 $(item)Emerald$()

pages.title: Description
pages.text: One of the larger peaceful ambient mobs of the world, Whales spawn in oceans and simply swim their life away. Not much else to do but watch the Whale swim!
